name: The Town
description: Synopsis of the story]Leo was attacked by mysterious men at night, and when he opened his eyes again, he found himself in a strange town. Leo explored the town alone, and at last he found the great secret of hiding in a small town ...Method of the game playingThis game is adventurous for linear text, but has selection points and multi-ending settings. Players get the plot pushed by exploring the map in the game and interacting with the map.Contact with authorPlease feedback with QQ 1150001578 if you find some bugs. We want to improve our game.
